sentence.Network_en: The government has been dilatory in dealing with the problem of unemployment.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府迟迟未解决失业问题。

sentence.Network_en: The boss sacked a dilatory worker yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天老板开除了一个凡事都爱拖延的人.

sentence.Network_en: You might expect politicians to smooth things out when civil servants are being dilatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 公务员办事拖沓，你可能认为政治家会把事情顺利解决。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... deport 驱逐出境 dilatory 拖拉 discrepancy 犯错误.
词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... dilate v. 使膨胀，使扩大 dilatory a. 拖拉的，不慌不忙的 lavish a. 浪费的，过度的（冲掉浪费）.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... propitiatory 讨好的，调解的 dilatory 慢吞吞的，磨蹭的 defamatory 诽谤的.
迂_百度百科 ... 迂夫子〖 pedantoldfogey〗 迂缓〖 dilatory;beslowinmovement〗 迂回〖 outflank〗.

list.abs: dilatory behaviour , actions , etc., 拖拉的行为 , 行动等.
例如雇主使用拖延战术（dilatory tactics），在Gopher Aviation, Inc.案例（1966），雇主的拖延战术是每当双方协议似乎已达成时， …
.... dilatory plea to the jurisdiction [法] 违反管辖权的延诉抗辩3. dilatory plea 迁延的答辩4. It is dilatory of you not to answer to me. 你真会拖.

finally , paper " dilatory law " regard one side as the mirror , edify people to make full use of time , improve time efficiency , quickly translate into fortune .最后，论文把“拖拉定律”作为一面镜子，启迪人们充分利用时间，提高时间效率，使时间资源更多、更快地转化为财富。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin dilatorius 'delaying', from Latin dilator 'delayer', from dilat- 'deferred', from the verb differre

entry.def: Someone or something that is dilatory is slow and causes delay.

example.ex: You might expect politicians to smooth things out when civil servants are being dilatory.
example.tran: 公务员办事拖沓，你可能认为政治家会把事情顺利解决。

means.word_mean: 1. inclined to waste time and lag behind
3. using cautious slow strategy to wear down opposition; avoiding direct confrontation;

auth_sentence.content: La Follette's dilatory move made another one possible.
auth_sentence.res_content: La Follette's dilatory move made another one possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: La Follette's dilatory move made another one possible.

auth_sentence.content: His political advisers were impatient of these dilatory movements.
auth_sentence.res_content: His political advisers were impatient of these dilatory movements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His political advisers were impatient of these dilatory movements.

auth_sentence.content: His ruling passion was...the bustle of business, but he was as dilatory in despatching it as he was eager to engage in it.
auth_sentence.res_content: His ruling passion was...the bustle of business, but he was as dilatory in despatching it as he was eager to engage in it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His ruling passion was...the bustle of business, but he was as dilatory in despatching it as he was eager to engage in it.

sentences.en: The boss sacked a dilatory worker yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天老板开除了一个凡事都爱拖延的人。
